channel.title: Need to interview a smoker and ex-smoker
channel.description:
For a school health assignment (nothing too important, just some homework really) I am meant to interview a smoker, and ex smoker and a non smoker. I can just interview my parents for a non smoker but I dont personally know any smokers or ex-smokers (and because i am too lazy to put much effort into finding one). So if anyone who smokes or smoked can help me out I have 5 questions I need to ask for both, 10 in total. Smoker questions: -How old were you when you became a regular smoker? -Why did you start smoking? -How many cigarettes do you smoke each day? -Where do you smoke? -Does anybody else in your family smoke?
Ex-Smoker questions: -How old were you when you started smoking? -How old were you when you stopped smoking? -How did you feel when you were trying to quit? -What was your main reasons for quitting? -Do you feel better now that you have quit?
Please post your answers here or pm me, thanks.

item.title: Need to interview a smoker and ex-smoker
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Scape_2.7 Dark Scape 2.7
item.description:
@Dark_Scape_2.7 wrote:

-How old were you when you started smoking? - 74
-How old were you when you stopped smoking? 74.6
-How did you feel when you were trying to quit? gassy…
-What was your main reasons for quitting? because my main got h4x3d
-Do you feel better now that you have quit? yea runescape was a waste
[center] Don’t spam please.[/center]

Read full topic
item.source: Need to interview a smoker and ex-smoker

item.title: Need to interview a smoker and ex-smoker
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

I know you’ve already had a smoker, but I generally dislike people saying “I started smoking because to look cool”

-How old were you when you became a regular smoker? 15
-Why did you start smoking? Curiosity, firstly, then after the first one, enjoyment.
-How many cigarettes do you smoke each day? Varies between a couple and a pack, depending on how many I feel like smoking that day.
-Where do you smoke? Outside, apart from the fact other people don’t enjoy smoke as I do, it’s usually nicer smoking outside anyway.
-Does anybody else in your family smoke? Not direct family, I’m sure someone does somewhere though.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to interview a smoker and ex-smoker

item.title: Need to interview a smoker and ex-smoker
item.dc:creator: @citisin citisin
item.description:
@citisin wrote:

lets see…
I started smoking when I was 12.
I started smoking because it was a way to get away from everything and it relaxed me.
I probably smoke about three or four cigarettes a day.
I smoke in my house, mostly outside, I don’t like the smell of cigarettes everywhere and my girl friend does like it.
None of my immediate family smokes.

Read full topic

item.title: Need to interview a smoker and ex-smoker
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

7th grade.
I liked the head buzz.
Pack or more depending on how much money I have to spend.
Where ever I have the chance.
Not in my immediate family.

item.source: Need to interview a smoker and ex-smoker

item.title: Need to interview a smoker and ex-smoker
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Ex-Smoker questions:
-How old were you when you started smoking? 13?
-How old were you when you stopped smoking? 14?
-How did you feel when you were trying to quit? Like I needed more.
-What was your main reasons for quitting? Health, girls.
-Do you feel better now that you have quit? 100%

I do it now and then, but in moderation.

Read full topic

item.title: Need to interview a smoker and ex-smoker
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

These questions are so generic it’s retarded.

I started at 10.
I thought it was cool.
I smoke a pack a day.
I smoke in a closet in my basement.
My microwave smokes a little, but it still works.
